info.author: Walid Saad
info.description:
TorrentUtils
============

Tools to manipulate torrents.

Install (automatic)
===================

::

    $ pip install torrentutils

Install (manual)
================

::

    $ git clone git@github.com:walidsa3d/torrentutils.git
    $ cd torrentutils
    $ python setup.py install

info.html_description:
TorrentUtils

Tools to manipulate torrents.

Install (automatic)

$ pip install torrentutils

Install (manual)

$ git clone git@github.com:walidsa3d/torrentutils.git
$ cd torrentutils
$ python setup.py install
